public class KawaProjectEvent
extends KawaEvent
Kawa project event type.

PROJECT_BUILD_BEGIN
Sent before a compile is started
PROJECT_BUILD_DONE
Sent after a compile is complete
PROJECT_CLOSED
Sent after closing a project
PROJECT_CLOSING
Sent prior to closing a project
PROJECT_OPENED
Sent after opening a project
PROJECT_OPENING
Sent prior to opening a project

KawaProjectEvent(int, KawaObject)
Event constructor.

PROJECT_OPENING 
 public static final int PROJECT_OPENING
Sent prior to opening a project

PROJECT_OPENED 
 public static final int PROJECT_OPENED
Sent after opening a project

PROJECT_CLOSING 
 public static final int PROJECT_CLOSING
Sent prior to closing a project

PROJECT_CLOSED 
 public static final int PROJECT_CLOSED
Sent after closing a project

PROJECT_BUILD_BEGIN 
 public static final int PROJECT_BUILD_BEGIN
Sent before a compile is started

PROJECT_BUILD_DONE 
 public static final int PROJECT_BUILD_DONE
Sent after a compile is complete

KawaProjectEvent 
 public KawaProjectEvent(int eventID,
                         KawaObject source)
Event constructor.

Parameters:
eventID - ID of the event
